title: Gift a techie a lifetime of 20TB cloud storage, now under $90 through Christmas
content:
Macworld

Cloud storage is incredibly valuable for most working professionals, students, creators, and even casual tech users. If you’re stumped on what to gift a loved one this holiday, why not increase their cloud storage capacity securely?

Through December 25, you can gift a lifetime subscription to Prism Drive Secure Cloud Storage. The 20TB plan is now only $89.97 (reg. $1494), and since it doesn’t require shipping, it makes the perfect last-minute gift!

In addition to the heaping 20TB of cloud storage in this deal, Prism Drive makes storing with them an enjoyable and elevated experience. The platform lets you create shareable links to easily share any videos, audio files, or graphics you may have uploaded. It also makes previewing and finding stuff easy with quick file previews, whether they’re documents, PDFs, text, etc.

The best part? Prism Drive boasts high-level security, using AES 256-bit and HTTPS encryption to ensure all files are secure in transit and at rest. No wonder one verified buyer wrote, “Works well and fast, and the access to my cloud data is very fast. If I have a question, I go to online chat and get instantly an answer.”

Gift someone special lifetime access to 20TB of Prism Drive Secure Cloud Storage for just $89.97 through December 25. No coupon required to snag this best-of-web pricing!
